00006 class patched_object {
00007         
00027         function patched_object() 
00028         {
00029                 //trigger_error("qcl_jsonrpc_object constructor called");
00030                 $args = func_get_args();
00031                 if (method_exists($this, '__destruct')) 
00032                 {
00033                         register_shutdown_function (array(&$this, '__destruct'));
00034                 }
00035                 if (method_exists($this, '__construct')) 
00036                 {
00037                         call_user_func_array(array(&$this, '__construct'), $args);
00038                 }
00039         }
00040 
00041     function __construct() {}
00042 
00043 }
00044 
00049 class qcl_jsonrpc_object extends patched_object {
00050 
00051    //-------------------------------------------------------------
00052    // common class variables to be overridden
00053    //-------------------------------------------------------------
00054 
00058         var $error;
00059         
00065         var $ini;
00066         
00070         var $result = array();
00071 
00072    //-------------------------------------------------------------
00073    // internal methods
00074    //-------------------------------------------------------------
00075         
00079         function __construct() 
00080         {
00081                 parent::__construct();
00082                 $this->configureService();
00083         }
00084 
00089         function &setSingleton( $instance ) 
00090         {
00091         global $qcl_jsonrpc_singletons;
00092         $classname = get_class ( $instance );
00093         $qcl_jsonrpc_singletons[$classname] = &$instance;
00094         return $instance;
00095     }
00096         
00097         
00103         function &getSingleton( $classname ) 
00104         {
00105         global $qcl_jsonrpc_singletons;
00106         $instance = &$qcl_jsonrpc_singletons[$classname];
00107         if ( ! is_object ($instance) ) 
00108         {
00109             $instance = new $classname;
00110         }
00111         return $instance;
00112     }
00113         
00120         function configureService()
00121         {
00122                 global $serviceComponents;
00123                 $currPath = servicePathPrefix;
00124                 $this->ini = array();
00125                 
00126                 // traverse service path and look for service.ini.php files 
00127                 // 
00128                 for ( $i=0; $i<count($serviceComponents); $i++ )
00129                 {
00130                          $currPath .= $serviceComponents[$i] . "/";
00131                          
00132                          // if config file exists, parse it and add/override config directives
00133                          if ( file_exists ($currPath . "/service.ini.php") )
00134                          {
00135                                 $config = parse_ini_file ( $currPath . "/service.ini.php", true);
00136                                 $this->ini = array_merge ( $this->ini, $config );
00137                          }
00138                 } 
00139         }
00140 
00146         function set ( $first, $value=null )
00147         {
00148                 if ( is_array( $first ) )
00149                 {
00150                         foreach( $first as $key => $value )
00151                         {
00152                                 $this->set ( $key, $value );
00153                         }
00154                 }
00155                 else
00156                 {
00157                         $this->result[$first] = $value;
00158                 }
00159         }
00160         
00161         
00166         function &get ( $key )
00167         {
00168                 return $this->result[$key];
00169         }
00170         
00174         function &getResult ( $key )
00175         {
00176                 return $this->result;
00177         }
00178         
00184         function addMessage ( $message, $data=true )
00185         {
00186                 if ( is_string ($message) )
00187                 {
00188                         $msg = array();
00189                         $msg[$message]= $data;
00190                 }
00191                 elseif( is_array($message) )
00192                 {
00193                         $msg = $message;
00194                 }
00195                 else
00196                 {
00197                         trigger_error ("Invalid parameter");
00198                 }
00199                 
00200                 $this->set("__messages", array_merge ( $this->get("__messages"), $msg ) );
00201         }
00202         
00206         function getServiceDirUrl($append="")
00207         {
00208                 global $serviceComponents;
00209                 $serverDirUrl = "http://" . getenv (HTTP_HOST) . dirname ( $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ) . "/";
00210                 return $serverDirUrl . $serviceComponents[0] . "/" . $append;
00211         }
00212         
00216         function raiseError( $message, $number=null, $file=null, $line=null )
00217         {
00218                 global $error;
00219                 if ( $file and $line )
00220                 {
00221                         $message .= " in $file, line $line.";
00222                 }
00223                 $error->setError( $number, stripslashes( $message ) );
00224                 $error->SendAndExit();
00225         }
00226         
00231         function debug($var,$html=false)
00232         {
00233                 if ( ! $html )
00234                 {
00235                         // we are in a jsonrpc request, send debug output as error message
00236                         trigger_error( print_r ( $var, true ) );
00237                 }
00238                 else
00239                 {
00240                         // we can happily output as a html response
00241                         echo "<pre>" . htmlentities(var_export( $var, true )) . "</pre>";       
00242                 }
00243         }
00244 }
